package.instruction:
This tweak allows you to replace or hide standard blackboard icons.

Replacing
1. Add a Blackboard item with one of the following names to replace the corresponding icons.
2. Upload a picture to the item using the picture button and hit submit.

Replacing Icon types
Everything Replacement Icon
Item Replacement Icon
Folder
Replacement Icon
Blog Replacement Icon
Wiki Replacement Icon
Title Replacement Icon

Replacing specific row/s icons
Replacement Icon: Name of Row (Must match row name)
OR
Replacement Icon: Row Set e.g. Replacement Icon: Tutorial replaces all 'Tutorial ...' icons

Hiding specific row/s icons
Hide Icon: Name of Row OR Hide Icon: Row Set (as above)

package.title: Image Map Link Mapper
package.description: Tested: Firefox 3.5, 3.6 Safari 5 Mac Chrome B7 IE 7, IE 8
package.instruction:
This tweak dynamically maps Blackboard resources (folders and links) into an Image Map. (Requires some HTML).

1. Create a Blackboard item and add an image using the Attach Image button.
2. Add your Blackboard folders and external or course links to the page that you wish to link to from the image map.
3. Generate an image map for this image. We recommend you use a web editor such as Dreamweaver or an online image map editor. Make sure you add the exact names of the folders or links to the ALT tag for each image map area. You can leave the href as '#'. 4. Add this image map HTML to the Blackboard page and make sure to add the 'usemap' attribute to the image.

Your image map should look like this:









Refer to Tweak Example site for an example and Image Map resource links. If you run into any problems, check that each image map link ALT tag corresponds exactly and uniquely to your folder / link names.

package.title: Load IFRAME as Content
package.description: Tested: Firefox 3.5, 3.6 Safari 5 Mac Chrome B7 IE 7, IE 8
package.instruction:
This tweak is useful for loading a web package into the full content area of Blackboard.

1. Upload your web package as an attachment to a Blackboard item called 'Web Package' and select 'special action': 'unpackage this file' and submit.
2. Select the web page inside the unpackaged file.
3. Switch to EDIT MODE Off to test web package in student view.

package.title: Dynamic Unit/Course Map Table
package.description: Tested: Firefox 3.5, 3.6 Safari 5 Mac Chrome B7 IE 7, IE 8
package.instruction:
This tweak dynamically maps Blackboard resources (folders and links) into a unit map table.

1. Add a Blackboard item named 'Unit Map'. Add a table with a heading row plus a row for each week / topic and columns for an index plus the different resource types you want to map. ( e.g. Lectures, Tutorials, Assessment.)
2. Fill in the Resource types along the top row cells and the weeks / topics down the left column. Add any extra text in the content cells to describe the content of the table items.
3. Add Blackboard resources e.g. folders using the index column title + ':' + resource row as a prefix.
e.g. Week 1: Lecture Schematics.

See Examples of Tweak Packages Site below for example and advanced options on link formatting, placement, highlighting and display.

package.title: Submenu
package.description: Tested: Firefox 3.5, 3.6 Safari 5 Mac Chrome B7 IE 7, IE 8
package.instruction:
This tweak adds a horizontal submenu based on the content items and subfolders of the current page. The menu can be text only, text overlaying an image or inserted into custom HTML. Integrates with other tweaks - e.g. check the Tweak Example site below for an example which uses Image Map, CSS and Icon replacement to great effect.

1. Add your content items and folders to your page.
2. Add the tweak at the base of the page.
Optional:
3. Add a Content item called 'Menu Image' and insert an image in the content area of the item. Make sure to include image height, width, alt text (and optionally CSS class). The image should be wide enough to accommodate the text of the menu items.

See the Tweak site for advanced examples using custom HTML.

package.title: Load Subsite
package.description: Tested: Firefox 3.5, 3.6 Safari 5 Mac Chrome B7 IE 7, IE 8
package.instruction:
This tweak is useful for loading a section of another Blackboard Site into the full content area of your current Blackboard site (for example - if you have content section created in a shared site that you want embedded in other sites).

1. Copy a link to the section of the sub site (e.g. from the left hand menu, or the Blackboard folder). Make sure you are in EDIT mode OFF -- and that students have guest or enrolled access to the subsite.
2. In the parent Blackboard Site, create an External Link called 'Site Link' and paste in the URL to the sub site section.
3. After adding this Tweak, switch to EDIT Mode Off to see the subsite load.
